info.description: API for the creation and management of credit agreements for Corporate customers. The types of credit agreements are Single Level Facility, Credit Agreement with Multiple Facilities, Club Loans with Agency and Syndicated Loans.
info.title: Corporate Credit Agreements

post.summary: Creates an offer for a deal contract
post.description: Creates new offer Deal for the required customer when the Mandatory input details are provided. Offer Deal creates a draft contract and allow the users to negotiate multiple times. Offer Deal is a draft contract and will not affect the Balance sheet of the bank.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Creates an offer for a facility contract
post.description: Creates a new offer Facility for the required customer when at least the Mandatory input is provided. Offer Facility creates a draft contract and allow the users to negotiate multiple times. Offer facility is a draft contract and will not affect the Balance sheet of the bank.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Deletes an offer for a deal contract
post.description: Deletes a new offer for the required deal contract when at least the Mandatory input is provided. Deal offer is a draft contract, which allow the user to delete the contract online and deal offer contract will not affect the balance sheet of the bank.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Deletes an offer for a facility contract
post.description: Deletes a new offer for the required facility contract when at least the Mandatory input is provided. Facility offer is a draft contract, which allow the user to delete the contract online and facility offer contract will not affect the balance sheet of the bank.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Accept the deal offer and execute the contract to live
post.description: On executing acceptance, the contract is changed from Offer to live Deal for the required customer when at least the Mandatory input is provided. Process will check all the required mandatory inputs and prompt an error message when mandatory details are not provided. Once the accept deal offer is processed further offer negotiation is not allowed.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Accept the facility offer and the execute the contract to live
post.description: On executing acceptance, the contract is changed from Offer to live Facility for the required customer when at least the Mandatory input is provided. Process will check all the required mandatory inputs and prompt an error message when mandatory details are not provided. Once the accept deal offer is processed further offer negotiation is not allowed.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.description: Convert an offer drawdown to a live drawdown for the required customer.

get.summary: Retrieves the available drawing products under the facility
get.description: Retrieves the available drawing products under the facility

parameters.name: facilityId
parameters.description: Unique identifier (contract number) of the facility

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

id.description: The identifier of the override.

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

effectiveDate.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction date. Dates are expected in ‘YYYYMMDD’ format

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

payInAccounts.description: Contains the account from which funds are to be debited against the payment type

payInAccount.description: Contains the account from which funds are to be debited against the payment type

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

requiredCurrencies.description: Contains the required currency for the sub contract, typical values can be PARENT.CURRENCY, ALLOWED.LIST or ANY

requiredCurrency.description: Contains the required currency for the sub contract, typical values can be PARENT.CURRENCY, ALLOWED.LIST or ANY

allowedCurrencies.description: Field denotes the currency set as allowed currency in Master account conditions.

allowedProductGroups.description: Group allowed to be used for a sub contract, for example Mortgages or Term Loans

allowedProductGroup.description: Group allowed to be used for a sub contract, for example Mortgages or Term Loans

allowedProducts.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

allowedProduct.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

borrower.description: Contains the nature of the borrower, typical values can be PARENT.OWNERS, PARENT.CUSTOMERS, ALLOWED.LIST and ANY

requiredBorrower.description: Contains the required borrowers for the sub contract, typical values can be ANY or ALL

allowedCustomer.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

requiredProducts.description: Contains the restrictions on the products to be used in the sub-contract, typical values can be ALLOWED.LIST or ANY. When ANY is given, it allows the sub-contract to be created with any product defined.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

validationLimit.description: The maximum limit that will be validated for which the bank is willing to lend the borrower

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

requiredCurrencies.description: Contains the required currency for the sub contract, typical values can be PARENT.CURRENCY, ALLOWED.LIST or ANY

requiredCurrency.description: Contains the required currency for the sub contract, typical values can be PARENT.CURRENCY, ALLOWED.LIST or ANY

allowedCurrencies.description: Field denotes the currency set as allowed currency in Master account conditions.

allowedProductGroups.description: Group allowed to be used for a sub contract, for example Mortgages or Term Loans

allowedProductGroup.description: Group allowed to be used for a sub contract, for example Mortgages or Term Loans

allowedProducts.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

allowedProduct.description: Product or products allowed to be used within the product bundle.

borrower.description: Contains the nature of the borrower, typical values can be PARENT.OWNERS, PARENT.CUSTOMERS, ALLOWED.LIST and ANY

requiredBorrower.description: Contains the required borrowers for the sub contract, typical values can be ANY or ALL

allowedCustomer.description: Customers who are part of Limit sharing Group.

requiredProducts.description: Contains the restrictions on the products to be used in the sub-contract, typical values can be ALLOWED.LIST or ANY. When ANY is given, it allows the sub-contract to be created with any product defined.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.
Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

facilityId.description: Unique identifier (contract number) of the facility

offerDate.description: Indicates the date on which the offer is executed

drawdownDate.description: Indicates the date on which the drawdown contract is created.

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

productGroup.description: Indicates a group under which the products exists

product.description: Indicates an id or name of a product

productLine.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

deferDate.description: Date that the payment has been deferred to

totalDue.description: This amount represents the total due amount for that period.

totalCapitalization.description: This amount represents the total capitalization amount for that period.

totalPrincipal.description: Contains the amount borrowed or the part of the amount borrowed which remains unpaid

totalInterest.description: Sum of the amounts that is apportioned to the interest of the facility and its drawings.

totalCharge.description: Sum of the amounts that is apportioned to the charges of the facility and its drawings.

totalTax.description: The total amount of Tax on outstanding interest and charges calculated up to the specified Capitalisation Date

totalPayment.description: This amount represents the total payment that has happened for the period

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans
